choices: Buy one can and share it
1.content:
It was a typical day in Denton Texas. The sun was shining a blistering hot day down on the residents. The shop merchant was headed to his store when he noticed some black goo on the side of Goats Man bridge. People around these parts were always looking for weird shit to buy this stuff would clearly sell if he could only come up with a name for it...something like Demon Blood. There was a lot of it too it would sell easily.

The next day....

You live at home in Denton with your parents and two brothers. You’re Levi the oldest at twenty and 6’5 then there was August the middle child at 16 and 6’1 and Damien the youngest at 12 who was only 5’5. For the most part you all got along there of course was sibling rivalry but what family didn’t?

The three of you arrived at the general store there was a saloon next door but none of you ever went in (or so everyone is lead to believe). As you walk in right on the counter is a miniature display of these black cans with Demon’s Blood written in red writing.

“Hey mister Black, what is this stuff?” Damien asked curiously.

You reach down grab the fan from your youngest brother and examine it. If feels warm despite being a can which worries you. “It’s nothing Dame” you say dismissively. “Something to draw tourists or something”

That’s when the shopkeeper butted in. “Actually fellas this is something I discovered by the goat bridge in town.” He said persuasively “You might wanna check it out.”

You looked at the can some more and pondered. Everyone knew there was a lot of unexplained things surrounding that bridge. It ought to be cool if it really was.

“Okay fine.” You said in defeat. “I will buy ONE can but if this is red play doh I am returning it for a full refund!”

Damien started tugging at your shirt. “But Levi....” he whined. “I want my own can.”

“Yeah bro” chimed in “August. “Let’s all get a can in case the shits good.”

Exasperated and sighing in disbelief you started at the can again. It looked so simple it had to be a prank...or is it?
1.title: Sales Intuition or Sales Nightmare?

choices: You use it on yourself...to make sure it’s safe....
11.content:
“Listen guys” you bellow “Since I am the only one of us with money that means I decide what we do with it. We’re buying one can.”

You take the can to the cashier forgetting why you come here in the first place and pay for it. The shopkeeper looks overjoyed. You aren’t sure if you’re wasting your money or not but five bucks isn’t a horrible price to pay for a souvenir. After leaving the store you three pile in the truck and head home. August tried to check it out while you drove and you snatched the can away.

“I’ll decide what to do once we’re home”

Damien pouts. “And to think I saw it first.”

You roll your eyes and ignore him you were almost home.

Once home since no one could wait you started looking at the can directions. It read “open at your own risk. Eat at a greater risk. Digestion is crucial to feel the effects.”

You scratch your head. “What in the hay is this shit? Eat it and what? You die? Become possessed? I dunno....”

Damien jumped and took the can from you. “I saw it first I wanna be a demon!”

You couldn’t believe what you just heard. You snatched the can away. “If anything I’ll try it first since I’m oldest!”
11.title: My money my rules

112.content:
You decide the best thing to do is make August try the can. He has no interest which was odd but at the same time meant if anything happened he wouldn’t go out of control or do anything stupid. Damien had offered some protesting but quickly piped down.

“So remind me again why it makes the most sense that I try this out? Damien is the one that wants it so bad plus what ever happened to torturing the youngest?”

You ignore him and proceed to open the can. You didn’t even have to pour or anything the contents leaped out of their container. The three of you gathered around the table it jumped on to watching it move of its own accord. It was black and goey very slime like with a hint of red in it very veiny looking. It seemed to be studying you if that was even possible there were no eyes or ears but then it did something you didn’t expect it leaped off the table and slid up Augusts’ nostrils. (So much for having to force him to eat it)

August hunched over in pain. He seemed to be groaning but then something changed in him: his eyes went all black and started laughing maniacally.
112.title: Force August to eat it.

choices: August grows out of the house
1121.content:
As August laughed he began to inch up in size. His pure black eyes looked ever glossy as he looked down at his brothers.

“I’ll bet you fools wish you had this power.” He said egotistically. As August’s head bumped the 10 foot ceiling his laughing deepened and pinned you under his massive growing boot. He wasn’t intent on hurting you...yet he just wanted to keep you there.

“Look at my big bro....always telling me what to do. Well, there won’t be much of that going on anymore...from now on this is MY world - and we go by my rules.

You were starting to have trouble breathing. Your brother’s boot was really heavy and you could feel it getting heavier - preventing you from moving. “Aug - buddy *cough* maybe lighten up on the press *cough* pressure here?” You managed to get out; but still he pressed harder on you as he got bigger. He had to sit down as he was too big for the room and even sitting was bumping his head on the ceiling. For now it seemed he had leveled his growth off.

Damien for his part learned quickly from your torment or was just that evil. He ran up to August and hugged his arm. Confused, August grabbed Damien in one hand and brought him up to his face. “What do you want runt?”

Damien was scared but still knew what he was doing. “I want to be with you.” He said sheepishly. August studied Damien considering his request. Clearly Damien lover the new August. That could prove useful. For now August would see how this played out and placed Damien lovingly on his shoulder.
1121.title: August starts growing taller

info.brief_description: A simple can causes chaos for the residents of Denton, Texas.
info.description:
Based as a spin off of the Monster Blood series a shopkeeper finds something that he doesn’t realize is going to make everyone wish they were in Hell. Unlike its predecessor Demon Blood can make you grow, make you muscular, make you demonic, or other things have fun with it!!!

Levi - oldest brother (you) responsible in charge 6’5 (gay)

August - middle brother rebel 6’1 (bi)

Damien - youngest brother a dark side to him 5’5 (unknown)

Please guys let’s not have one sentence editions
